attributes.background: Start listening to the 48% who voted , remain. We want a referendum on the proposed exit strategy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you like, you could also sign the petition below, which asks for a second EU referendum:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/176339
